verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: We sent Noah to his people: "Warn your people before there comes upon them a painful punishment."
verse.verse_2: He said, "O my people, I am to you a clear warner.
verse.verse_3: Worship God and reverence Him, and obey me.
verse.verse_4: And He will forgive you of your sins, and reprieve you until a stated term. God's term cannot be deferred once it has arrived, if you only knew."
verse.verse_5: He said, "My Lord, I have called my people night and day.
verse.verse_6: But my call added only to their flight.
verse.verse_7: Whenever I called them to Your forgiveness, they thrust their fingers into their ears, and wrapped themselves in their garments, and insisted, and became more and more arrogant.
verse.verse_9: Then I appealed to them publicly, and I spoke to them privately.
verse.verse_10: I said, 'Ask your Lord for forgiveness; He is Forgiving.
verse.verse_11: He will let loose the sky upon you in torrents.
verse.verse_12: And provide you with wealth and children, and allot for you gardens, and allot for you rivers.
verse.verse_13: What is the matter with you, that you do not appreciate God's Greatness?
verse.verse_14: Although He created you in stages.
verse.verse_15: Do you not realize that God created seven heavens in layers?
verse.verse_16: And He set the moon in their midst for light, and He made the sun a lamp.
verse.verse_17: And God germinated you from the earth like plants.
verse.verse_18: Then He will return you into it, and will bring you out again.
verse.verse_19: And God made the earth a spread for you.
verse.verse_20: That you may travel its diverse roads.'"
verse.verse_21: Noah said, "My Lord, they have defied me, and followed him whose wealth and children increase him only in perdition."
verse.verse_23: And they said, "Do not give up your gods; do not give up Wadd, nor Souwa, nor Yaghoos, and Yaooq, and Nassr.
verse.verse_24: They have misled many, so do not increase the wrongdoers except in confusion."
verse.verse_25: Because of their wrongs, they were drowned, and were hurled into a Fire. They did not find apart from God any helpers.
verse.verse_26: Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave of the unbelievers a single dweller on earth.
verse.verse_27: If You leave them, they will mislead your servants, and will breed only wicked unbelievers.
verse.verse_28: My Lord! Forgive me and my parents, and anyone who enters my home in faith, and all the believing men and believing women; and do not increase the wrongdoers except in perdition."
